entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
